meanings.definition: Used as an exclamation of surprise or disbelief.
meanings.sent1: Gorblimey! I can't believe my eyes!
meanings.sent3: When the cat started talking, gorblimey, I nearly jumped out of my skin!
meanings.sent4: The sudden thunderstorm was like a gorblimey wake-up call from nature.
meanings.sent5: The magician's disappearing act left the audience shouting 'gorblimey!' in amazement.

meanings.definition: A slang term expressing astonishment or shock.
meanings.sent1: His constant use of 'gorblimey' made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The loud 'gorblimey' echoed through the room, catching everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The gorblimey on his face when he saw the surprise party was priceless.
meanings.sent4: The news of the alien invasion was a gorblimey moment for the whole town.
meanings.sent5: The gorblimey in her voice revealed her genuine shock at the turn of events.
